name: baseline-buddy-suite
description: AI-Powered Ecosystem for Modern Web Features - Complete Baseline compliance toolkit

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:cli && npm run build:extension && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:cli" "npm run dev:extension" "npm run dev:dashboard"
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:cli && npm run test:extension && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.lint: npm run lint:core && npm run lint:cli && npm run lint:extension && npm run lint:dashboard
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/core && npm install && cd ../cli-tool && npm install && cd ../vscode-extension && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd ../cicd-plugin && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:core && npm run clean:cli && npm run clean:extension && npm run clean:dashboard
